def_cn: (使)复苏;(使)复兴;(使)恢复;(使)再次流行
def_en: When something such as the economy, a business, a trend, or a feeling is revived or when it revives, it becomes active, popular, or successful again.

def_cn: 重新上演(戏剧、歌剧或芭蕾等)
def_en: When someone revives a play, opera, or ballet, they present a new production of it.
If you manage to revive someone who has fainted or if they revive, they become conscious again.
